pluggable.name: Shield
pluggable.author: Morgante Pell
The Habari Community
pluggable.description: Shield is a grid-based theme designed specifically for Habari. Please consult the help.

help.value:
If you are seeing error messages, be sure to configure the theme settings.

The stories slider in the top right of the header is constructed by creating story blocks and then putting them into the stories area.

The header navigation bar is created by finding pages tagged navmenu. So, to add a page to the navigation bar, just tag it navmenu.
